jobs.title: Research Managers/ Senior Research Managers
jobs.about_us: You can expect to be joining a dynamic and creative agency. You will be involved in researching some of the world’s leading brands across a range of sectors. You will handle multiple accounts independently from start to finish, ensuring that the clients’ business issues and information needs are effectively met through well-executed research. In this position, you will be responsible in producing outstanding results in all aspects of market research including problem definition, design, vendor and client management, data collection, data analysis, report writing and presentations. You will help mentor more junior staff and will support the more senior team with client growth and new business pitches. As a highly motivated individual, you should enjoy innovating and thinking creatively. Successful candidates can expect a challenging environment and career development that includes domestic and international assignments and overseas posting opportunities.

jobs.title: Market Research Data Analyst
jobs.location: Central Singapore Community Development Council, Singapore
jobs.about_us: Agility Research & Strategy is currently looking for a dynamic candidate to fill this position. Our team is a diverse group of talented individuals that come from a range of backgrounds, Our DNA is agile, intelligent, self-starters who are keen to grow and learn. Working with the C suite of the world's leading Premium and Luxury brands, this role gives the right individual an opportunity to help these brands with our proven methodologies and solutions. We are looking for a data and research analyst who is able to translate data into summaries and can do analysis with conclusions that deliver on objectives and support proactive insights and recommendations. The role will include writing creative reports for premium brands and looking at data from various sources including survey data and big data sources like social media.
jobs.job_description: For this role, you will need at least a bachelor's degree in marketing research or a related discipline like statistics or maths. And experience with different data sources and reports. Atleast 4 to 7 years of experience with data and analysis.
jobs.job_requirements:
Education & Experience
4-7 years’ experience in working with multiple data set
Self-motivated with high ethical standards, able to work independently and as a team.
Proven ability to meet strict deadlines and maintain timelines and calendars.
Ability to work in a fast-paced and constantly changing environment.
Capable of thinking outside the box and generating creative ideas.

What Soft Skills Do You Need?

Verbal Communication: Good speaking skills will allow you to present the results of your research to clients and colleagues.
Listening: Strong listening skills are essential to understanding your clients' needs and the scope of the projects on which you are working.
Writing: You must be able to present written reports of your research.
Reading Comprehension: You will have to be able to understand a large number of documents, including research reports and survey responses.
Critical Thinking: As a marketing research analyst, you will have to decide between different strategies to market products. Your ability to compare and contrast different approaches to make an educated decision is essential.
Problem Solving: You must be able to detect problems, and come up with solutions.
Analytical Skills: Your research will yield a lot of data that you must be able to analyze, understand, and from which you must draw conclusions. This part of your job will also require you to be detail oriented.

jobs.job_description: This is a full-time on-site role as an R&D Manager located in Masai. The R&D Manager will be responsible for overseeing day-to-day activities related to research and development, project management, team management, and team leadership.

jobs.title: Research Engineer - FEOL Process Integration
jobs.about_us: GLOBAL FOUNDRIES is the world’s first full-service semiconductor foundry with a truly global footprint. Launched in March 2009, the company has quickly achieved scale as one of the largest foundries in the world, providing a unique combination of advanced technology and manufacturing to more than 250 customers. With operations in Singapore, Germany and the United States, GLOBAL FOUNDRIES is the only foundry that offers the flexibility and security of manufacturing centers spanning three continents. The company’s 300mm fabs and 200mm fabs provide the full range of process technologies from mainstream to the leading edge. This global manufacturing footprint is supported by major facilities for research, development and design enablement located near hubs of semiconductor activity in the United States, Europe and Asia. GLOBAL FOUNDRIES is owned by the Mubadala Development Company.
jobs.job_description: This position is for a Device and/or Integration Engineer to be a part of the GLOBAL FOUNDRIES Technology Research group at the Albany NanoTech Albany, NY. The individual is expected to lead a portion of the technical activities of a multidisciplinary research activity in the pathfinding, platform, or corridor programs, coordinating across departments and companies to complete technology definition and feasibility demonstrations to fulfill Fab8 requirements. The job involves working in the IBM research alliance with engineers from other partner companies. The primary objective of this position is to conduct research and early integration and process flow development of advanced modules to enable 7nm and beyond platform technologies. The selected individual will work closely with the device, TCAD and unit process development teams as well as design teams defining and executing the integration to meet advanced node requirement. In addition to the employee will also transfer technology developed in Albany to GLOBAL FOUNDRIES Fab8 facility in Malta, NY.
jobs.job_requirements:
Required Qualifications
- Technology related Master's degree plus 5 years or doctorate degree plus 3 years of experience in BEOL integration or related unit process field(s).
- International and domestic travel may be required.

Additional Eligibility Qualifications
- An offer of employment with GLOBAL FOUNDRIES is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background check and drug screen, as applicable, and subject to applicable laws and regulations.

Preferred Qualifications
- Must have a hands-on knowledge of MOL and/or FEOL integration and associated Fab processes.
- Demonstrated expertise in research and development of integrating advanced and complex processes and process technologies.
- Understanding of and familiarity with various characterization techniques including ellipsometry, film stress measurement, SIMS, XPS, adhesion testing, nanoindentation, etc.
- In-depth understanding and working knowledge of Statistical Process Control (SPC) and/or Design of Experiments (DOE).
- Ability to work effectively and efficiently with diverse teams, customers, internal and external partners.
- Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
- Excellent interpersonal skills, energetic, and self-starter.
- Demonstrated ability to work well within a globally matrixed team or environment.
- Demonstrated ability to communicate well with all levels of the organization and experience in working with external constituencies.
- Strong organizational skills; demonstrated ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and able to react to shifting priorities to meet business needs.
- Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines and commitments.
- PhD in Physics, Chemistry, Materials Science, or Engineering.
- Experience as MOL module or level owner in advanced CMOS research and/or development.
- Experience and understanding of high volume manufacturing preferred.
- Understanding of FEOL, MOL, and/or BEOL integration is a plus.
- Understanding and knowledge of current MOL integration trends and roadmap is a plus.
- IBM Alliance experience is a plus.

jobs.title: Research Engineer, Agentic AI Evals
jobs.about_us: HUD (YC W25) is developing agentic evals for Computer Use Agents (CUAs) that browse the web. Our CUA Evals framework is the first comprehensive evaluation tool for CUAs. Our Mission: People don't actually know if AI agents are working. To make AI agents work in the real world, we need detailed evals for a huge range of tasks. We're backed by Y Combinator, and work closely with frontier AI labs to provide agent evaluation infrastructure at scale.
jobs.job_description:
We're looking for a research engineer to help build out task configs and environments for evaluation datasets on HUD's CUA evaluation framework.
Responsibilities
- Build out environments for HUD's CUA evaluation datasets, including evals for safety redteaming, general business tasks, long-horizon agentic tasks etc.
- Deliver custom CUA datasets and evaluation pipelines requested by clients
- Contribute to improving the HUD evaluation harness, depending on your interests, skills, and current organizational priorities. (Optional, but highly valued!)
jobs.job_requirements:
Experience
Technical Skills
- Proficiency in Python, Docker, and Linux environments
- React experience for frontend development
- Production-level software development experience preferred
- Strong technical aptitude and demonstrated problem-solving ability

Strong Candidates May Have
- Startup experience in early-stage technology companies with ability to work independently in fast-paced environments
- Strong communication skills for remote collaboration across time zones
- Familiarity with current AI tools and LLM capabilities
- Understanding of safety and alignment considerations in AI systems
- Evidence of rapid learning and adaptability in technical environments (e.g. programming competitions)
- Have hands-on experience with or contributed to LLM evaluation frameworks (EleutherAI, Inspect, or similar)
- Built custom evaluation pipelines or datasets
- Worked with agentic or multimodal AI evaluation systems

We prioritize technical aptitude and learning potential over years of experience. Motivated candidates are encouraged to apply even if they don't meet all criteria.
